name: pacify

pacify verb [T]
(CALM)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause someone who is angry or upset to be calm and satisfied: He pacified his crying child with a bottle. It was difficult for the police to pacify the angry crowd.

pacify verb [T]
(PEACE)
to bring peace to a place or end war in a place, often using military force: A UN force has been sent in to try and pacify the area worst affected by the civil war.

to cause someone who is angry or upset to be calm and satisfied: The governor later apologized, but union members weren’t pacified.
To pacify a place is to bring peace there or end a war: The US plans to send troops to pacify the country.
